answers.answer: It could be many things.Could be stressCould be that you need help to start your AF. Progesterone will start it.I had the same issue. I went to see a doctor and they said I have PCOS. they gave me medication for that. and progesterone so I will have an AF.Hope that helps.

Yep, as lori said it could be a variety of things.  If you are not pregnant and are urinating frequently it would be wise to go to the doctor in case you have adult onset diabetes - one of the many conditions that could cause your symptoms but something that needs treatment.

question: i need advice.i havent had my periods for the last four months or so.i was constipated for a few days(TMI) sorry.im urinating more than usual in smaller amounts.i have done about 15 tests and all where negative.anyone got any ideas wat it could be??.i really dont want to go doctor im so afraid.please help please
title: need advice please
